mapper.select: SELECT acc."id" , acc.account_name as "accountName" , acc.account_id as "accountId" , accType.account_type as "accountType" , acc.account_balance as "accountBalance" , acc.account_curency as "currency" ,acc.account_status as "status" from account_details as acdt INNER JOIN account as acc on acc."id" = acdt.sub_account_id INNER JOIN account_type as accType on acc.account_type = accType."id" WHERE acdt.main_account_id = #{mainAccountID} ORDER BY acc."id" ASC;

SELECT acc."id" , acc.account_name as "accountName" , acc.account_id as "accountId" , accType.account_type as "accountType" , acc.account_balance as "accountBalance" , acc.account_status as "status" , acc.account_curency as "currency" FROM account as acc INNER JOIN account_type as accType on acc.account_type = accType."id" WHERE acc.user_id = #{userID};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resource_img ( id, file_source, file_name, file_size, file_extension, file_type, status, original_name, create_date, create_by ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{file_source}, #{file_name}, #{file_size}, #{file_extension}, #{file_type}, #{status}, #{original_name}, to_char(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD'), #{user_id} )
